previous.title: üìÖ Daily Planner App
previous.description: A simple calendar application that allows a user to save events for each hour of the day. This app implements DOM manipulation, and integration of Web APIs, like session and local storage. This app run in the browser and feature dynamically updated HTML and CSS using Vanilla JavaScript.

bootcamp.title: üå°Ô∏è ‚òÅÔ∏è Weather Dashboard
bootcamp.description: A web application to search for weather forecasts in geographic locations around the world. This app implements DOM manipulation, and integration of Web APIs, like session and local storage.

bootcamp.title: üõçÔ∏è Fakee-Shop
bootcamp.description: Fakee-Shop is an implementation of an online retail store, starting from a given UX/UI concept, and creating an MVP in a sprint of 2 weeks, using rapid prototyping frameworks.

bootcamp.title: üìù Professional README Generator
bootcamp.description: A command-line application that dynamically generates a professional README.md file from a user's input using the Inquirer package.

bootcamp.title: üìá Team Profile Generator
bootcamp.description: A Node.js CLI application that will take in information about employees on a software engineering team, then generates an HTML webpage that displays summaries for each person, following Agile methodology, OO paradigm and TDD/BDD development in JavaScript.

bootcamp.title: üìñ My Portfolio in React
bootcamp.description: My personal portfolio created using React.js
